modName: Daedric Punishment for Insults Related to Sweetrolls
summary:
Sheogorath has grown tired of having his sweetroll-owning status questioned by passing guards!
Henceforth, any man who suggests that somebody's sweetrolls have been stolen shall face his wrath!
descriptionHtml:
By popular demand,
Sheogorath grows tired of insolent guards snidely insinuating that he is unable to keep track of his sweetrolls.

Henceforth, such behaviour shall not go unpunished!

(Also available on the Steam Workshop: [url=http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=112286694]http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=112286694[/url])

A polish translation thanks to MrQubo is available here: [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/45308]http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/45308[/url]

This mod is compatible with my other ones:
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/15428]Divine Punishment for Mention of Arrows in the Knee[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/69069]Dragon Punishment for Cloud District Quips[/url]

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/9385]Stones of Barenziah Quest Markers[/url]
